item.title: OpenAI 希望创建一家公益公司。这意味着什么？
item.description: 几个月来，OpenAI 一直在努力从非营利机构转型为更传统的赚钱企业，在承受了公众的压力之后，OpenAI 决定部分收回其计划，并达成一种复杂的平衡。虽然 ChatGPT 的所有者仍打算成立一家公益公司，以便对投资者更有吸引力，但整体业务仍将由 OpenAI 的非营利实体监管。【原文：After months of public pressure over its effort to convert from a nonprofit into a more traditional moneymaking business, OpenAI decided to partly walk back its plan and strike a complicated balance. While the ChatGPT owner still intends to form a public benefit corporation that’s meant to be more appealing to investors, the overall business would continue to be overseen by OpenAI’s nonprofit entity.】

item.title: 美联储观望信息深入人心，国债收益率上升
item.description: 美国国债收益率周四上涨，原因是在美联储主席鲍威尔表示不会仓促降低借贷成本后，交易员减少了对美联储降息的押注。【原文：US Treasury yields rose on Thursday as traders pared bets on interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve after Chair Jerome Powell said he won’t be rushed into lowering borrowing costs.】

item.title: 印尼大型镍厂在致命山体滑坡后重新启动
item.description: 印度尼西亚一个主要金属加工中心的镍工厂在 3 月份发生致命山体滑坡迫使几乎所有生产暂停后已重新启动。【原文：A nickel plant at a major metal-processing hub in Indonesia has restarted after a deadly landslide in March forced a suspension of virtually all production.】

item.title: 与专员海丝特-皮尔斯一起了解特朗普的美国证券交易委员会内幕
item.description:
在监管机构任职期间，皮尔斯的立场从边缘走向主流。在本期Trillions节目中，她讲述了自己的心路历程。【原文：

During her tenure at the regulator, Peirce’s positions moved from fringe to mainstream. In this episode of Trillions, she describes her journey. 

】

item.title: 人工智能正在将水从最需要的地区抽走
item.description:
彭博新闻社的一项分析发现，在过去三年中，美国各地新建了160多个人工智能数据中心，而这些数据中心所在地区的水资源已经十分匮乏。【原文：

More than 160 new AI data centers have been built across the US in the past three years in regions already grappling with scarce water resources, a Bloomberg News analysis finds.

】

item.title: 科技、人工智能公司负责人敦促参议员放松监管
item.description: 周四，一些最大的科技和人工智能公司的领导人将带着一份愿望清单前往美国国会，其中最重要的是取消他们认为会抑制其公司发展的法规，并将业务转移到中国。【原文：The leaders of some of the biggest technology and artificial intelligence companies will go to Congress on Thursday with a wish list of sorts that at its top has doing away with regulation they say inhibits their firms’ growth and by default, sends business to China.】

item.title: 阿布扎比穆巴达拉公司建立 200 亿美元私人信贷组合
item.description: 作为全球最活跃的主权财富基金，穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：Mubadala Investment Co. deployed 119 billion dirhams ($32 billion) last year, as the world’s most active sovereign wealth fund deepened its push into sectors such as private credit and artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 劳合社任命前 Aviva 高管为下任首席执行官
item.description: 伦敦劳合社已任命 Patrick Tiernan 为下一任首席执行官，现任首席执行官 John Neal 即将转投 Aon Plc。【原文：Lloyd’s of London has named Patrick Tiernan as its next Chief Executive Officer following the departure of current boss John Neal who is set to move to Aon Plc.】

item.title: 斯洛文尼亚计划今年将军费开支提高到国内生产总值的 2
item.description: 由于北约成员国面临美国要求增加安全投入的压力，斯洛文尼亚计划今年将军费开支提高到经济产出的 2%。【原文：Slovenia plans to increase military spending to 2% of economic output this year as NATO members face pressure from the US to increase investment in security.】

item.title: 特斯拉印度负责人辞职，正值汽车制造商准备进军当地市场之际
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，特斯拉公司印度区负责人普拉尚特-梅农（Prashanth Menon）已经辞职，而此时这家电动汽车制造商正在加紧制定进军印度的计划，将在孟买和德里开设首家零售店。【原文：Tesla Inc.’s India country head, Prashanth Menon, has resigned just as the electric carmaker firms up its plan to enter the country with its first retail outlets in Mumbai and Delhi, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国重申美国应在贸易谈判前取消关税
item.description: 北京再次呼吁美国取消对中国的单边关税，这凸显了世界最大经济体之间在准备初步贸易谈判时的僵局。【原文：Beijing reiterated its call for the US to cancel unilateral tariffs on China, underscoring a standoff between the world’s largest economies as they prepare for initial trade talks.】

item.title: 贸易担忧缓解，比特币逼近 100,000 美元，以太币大涨
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普有望宣布与英国达成贸易协定，比特币自 2 月份以来首次逼近 100,000 美元大关。【原文：Bitcoin approached the $100,000 mark for the first time since February with US President Donald Trump expected to announce a trade agreement with the UK.】

item.title: 日本电产撤回对牧野铣床 18 亿美元的恶意竞购
item.description: 面对强烈反对和可能采取的防御措施，日本电产株式会社周四撤回了以 2,570 亿日元（18 亿美元）主动提出的对机床制造商牧野铣床株式会社的收购要约。【原文：Nidec Corp. withdrew its ¥257 billion ($1.8 billion) unsolicited tender offer for machine tool maker Makino Milling Machine Co. on Thursday in the face of strong opposition and possible defense measures.】

item.title: 欧洲在华企业统计新贸易战爆发以来的损失情况
item.description: 一项调查发现，大多数在华欧洲企业迄今为止都能限制贸易战带来的直接损害，尽管大多数企业承认今年的经营环境变得更具挑战性。【原文：Most European companies in China have so far been able to limit the direct damage from the trade war, a survey has found, though a majority conceded their business environment has grown more challenging this year.】

item.title: 挪威将利率维持在 16 年高位，并承诺未来将削减利率
item.description: 挪威央行在连续第11次会议上保持借贷成本稳定，并重申计划在今年晚些时候开始放宽政策。【原文：Norway’s central bank kept borrowing costs steady for its 11th consecutive meeting, and reiterated its plan to begin easing later this year.】

item.title: 中国如何应对美国的贸易战
item.description:
是在强势地位上进行谈判吗？【原文：

Is it negotiating from a position of strength?

】

item.title: 奇货可居：中国如何应对美国的贸易战（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：中国如何应对美国的贸易战（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: How China Might Really Handle a US Trade War (Podcast)】

item.title: Neuberger Berman、安本青睐印度债券，尽管存在边境争端
item.description: 海外投资者称，印度资产受到央行扩大现金注入和更大幅度降息预期的提振，这消除了人们对巴基斯坦冲突的担忧。【原文：Overseas investors say Indian assets are buoyed by expectations of the central bank extending cash injections and deeper rate cuts, which are countering concerns over the Pakistan conflict.】

item.title: 中国考虑全面改革住房市场以抑制预售
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国正在酝酿对全国范围内的房屋销售方式进行重大改革，要求开发商只提供已完工的房产，而不是采用加剧了住房危机的预售模式。【原文：China is mulling a dramatic overhaul in the way homes are sold nationwide, requiring developers to offer only completed properties instead of using the pre-sales model that has exacerbated the housing crisis, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马斯克回击 OpenAI 声称他在伤害初创公司
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对 OpenAI 指责他一年多来一直在 "不遗余力 "地破坏这家初创公司进行了回击。【原文：Elon Musk fired back at OpenAI’s accusation that he’s been waging a “relentless” campaign for more than a year to damage the startup.】

item.title: 瑞典暂时避免降息，但立场转向宽松
item.description: 瑞典央行维持利率不变，但发出了倾向于宽松的信号，因为决策者们正在评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战的影响。【原文：The Riksbank kept its interest rate unchanged but signaled a bias toward easing as policymakers gauge the impact of US President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 散户投资者从欧洲房地产基金撤资 130 亿美元
item.description: 由于违约率上升和利率上调限制了欧洲房地产基金的吸引力，散户投资者继续从该行业撤资。【原文：Retail investors are continuing to pull money from European real estate funds as rising levels of defaults and higher interest rates limit the attractiveness of the industry.】

item.title: 希思罗机场大火时间轴确定，电网安全焦点更加突出
item.description: 随着电网安全审查的加强，国家能源系统运营商列出了伦敦希思罗机场前所未有的长达一天的大停电事件的详细时间表。【原文：A detailed timeline of the events surrounding the unprecedented day-long blackout that hit London’s Heathrow Airport has been set out by the National Energy System Operator, as scrutiny of grid security intensifies.】

item.title: 阿尔罗萨公司发现俄罗斯最大的珠宝级钻石
item.description: 阿尔罗萨股份公司（Alrosa PJSC）说，它开采出了俄罗斯有史以来最大的珠宝级钻石。【原文：Alrosa PJSC said it mined Russia’s largest ever diamond of jewelry quality.】

item.title: 关税威胁逼近，马来西亚维持利率不变
item.description: 马来西亚周四维持利率不变，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策给经济增长带来隐隐风险的情况下保留了政策弹药。【原文：Malaysia kept interest rates unchanged on Thursday, saving its policy ammunition amid looming risks to growth from US President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气价格在欧盟就储气目标投票前摇摆不定
item.description: 在就更宽松的燃料储存规则进行投票之前，欧洲天然气价格出现波动，这一决定可能会减轻该地区在冬季到来之前增加供应的努力。【原文：European natural gas prices fluctuated ahead of a vote on more relaxed fuel-storage rules, a decision that could alleviate the region’s efforts to build up supplies ahead of winter.】

item.title: 任天堂对 Switch 2 的销量预期保守为 1,500 万台
item.description: 任天堂公司（Nintendo Co.）预计，Switch 2 的初期销量将低于预期，这反映出美国关税的不确定性正在如何拖累这家需求量创下历史新高的公司。【原文：Nintendo Co. projected weaker-than-expected initial sales of the Switch 2, a reflection of how uncertainty around US tariffs is weighing even on a company fielding record-setting demand.】

item.title: 信实寻求在媒体宣传中为 "辛杜尔行动 "注册商标
item.description: 亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）领导的信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）本周申请将 "辛杜尔行动"（Operation Sindoor）这一术语注册为商标，这是印度对巴基斯坦境内恐怖分子营地发动军事进攻的代号。【原文：Billionaire Mukesh Ambani-led Reliance Industries Ltd. moved to trademark the term ‘Operation Sindoor,’ the codename of India’s military offensive against terrorist camps in Pakistan this week.】

item.title: 英国 Centrica 公司将提高股息以应对贸易战
item.description: Centrica Plc 将增加本年度的股息，在监测贸易战对业务的影响的同时，提高对股东的回报。【原文：Centrica Plc will increase its dividends for the year, boosting returns to shareholders as it monitors the impact the trade war will have on the business.】

item.title: AIB 与爱尔兰政府进行 12 亿美元回购
item.description: 爱尔兰国际银行集团（AIB Group Plc）的董事会将着手从爱尔兰国家手中回购 12 亿欧元（14 亿美元）的股份，此前股东们已批准了这项交易，这将使该银行濒临完全私有化的边缘。【原文：AIB Group Plc’s board will proceed with a €1.2 billion ($1.4 billion) share buyback from the Irish state, after shareholders approved the deal that will put the bank on the brink of full private ownership.】
